dcterms:creator: Dragomir R. Radev
Pradeep Muthukrishnan
Vahed Qazvinian
Amjad Abu-Jbara
dcterms:description: The AAN corpus consists of 23,766 papers written by 18,862 authors in 373 venues related to NLP and forms a citation network. Each paper is represented by a node with directed edges connecting a paper to all its cited papers. Papers that have been cited by the parent paper are treated as similar samples.
dcterms:title: ACL Anthology Network Corpus (AAN)

dcterms:creator: Jyun-Yu Jiang
Mingyang Zhang
Cheng Li
Michael Bendersky
Nadav Golbandi
Marc Najork
dcterms:description: The WIKI dataset consists of Wikipedia articles processed to create a dataset of similar articles based on outgoing links. Articles with a Jaccard similarity greater than 0.5 are considered similar.
dcterms:title: Wikipedia Articles (WIKI)

dcterms:description: The PAT dataset consists of patents sampled from the publicly available USPTO patents belonging to various categories. It is an industry gold standard dataset used for document matching tasks.
dcterms:title: USPTO Patents (PAT)
